<<<I will add one google prefix each week>>>

UPDATE 12 NOV 2011: Slight change from what it used to be; all orange are now blue. 

UPDATE 1 NOV 2011: removed Google+ and all url-prefixs; now it will only work on https/http google.com...I will add them when all issues regarding colour synchronizing are dealt with. Sorry for the inconvenience, and thank you for your support.
    
UPDATE----Added Google+

This is a work in progress.....please do comment for any reason!
Click on the image to view it in HQ...Thanks

If you like this kind of style, and would like it even more on a website of your choosing....Send me a private message...I'll do it for you....Cheers,
